about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the captivating realm of 'Jack's Labyrinth,' an exhilarating video game that combines strategy, action, and puzzle-solving. As the intrepid adventurer, Jack, you'll traverse a series of intricate labyrinthine levels, each brimming with a myriad of challenges and rewards.

Your ultimate objective is clear: collect all the orbs scattered throughout the labyrinth to amass precious points. However, the path to victory is fraught with danger, as malevolent enemies known as 'evil guardians' relentlessly pursue you, aiming to halt your progress. Swift reflexes, calculated moves, and strategic planning will be your greatest allies as you navigate the twists and turns of each level.

Game Features
  • Intricate Labyrinthine Environments: Immerse yourself in intricately designed labyrinthine levels that challenge your navigational skills and strategic thinking, creating a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.
  • Strategic Orb Collection: Collect orbs strategically placed throughout the labyrinth, requiring you to plan your route carefully while avoiding relentless enemies that seek to impede your progress.
  • Vulnerable Guardians with Power Spheres: Unleash the potential of powerful spheres that, when collected, temporarily weaken and render the pursuing 'evil guardians' vulnerable, allowing you to turn the tables on your foes and escape their clutches.
  • Visually Stunning Graphics: Immerse yourself in a visually striking world brought to life with captivating graphics, enhancing your exploration of the labyrinth and adding to the overall immersive experience.
  • Achievements and Progression: Embark on a journey of accomplishment as you conquer levels, master challenges, and unlock a range of achievements, showcasing your skill and determination as you guide Jack toward his destiny.

name: Jack's Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 TI
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Navigate 'Jack's Labyrinth,' collect orbs, dodge enemies, and use spheres strategically. Thrilling gameplay, stunning visuals. Shape Jack's destiny!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
